workshoptitle: Build a Data Lake with Autonomous Data Warehouse (ODTUG KScope 24)

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up the Workshop Environment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your workshop environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load Local Data
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to load local data into your ADW instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Link to Data in Public Object Storage Buckets
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to link data in public object storage buckets.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Link to Data from Private Object Storage Buckets
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to link data from private object storage buckets.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create and Query External Tables Using Delta Sharing Protocol
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how ADW supports Public Data Share.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Query Data Across Multi-Cloud Data Lakes
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to query data from OCI and AWS S3.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Query Iceberg Tables
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to query Iceberg tables in ADW.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Integrate ADW with AWS Glue Data Catalogs
tutorials.description: This lab shows ADW integration with AWS Data Catalogs.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Performance Best Practices
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to improve query performance.

tutorials.title: Lab 10: ADW Multi-language Support
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how ADW supports multiple languages

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Clean up Resources Used in the Workshop (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
